r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">alunos de escola pública</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Estudantes podem concorrer a 10 mil vagas gratuitas em ensino técnico de turismo </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Apenas alunos de escola pública terão direito às vagas. Processo seletivo ocorrerá por meio das Secretarias Estaduais de Turismo.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" mundo","url":"http://g1.globo.com/educacao/noticia/canadense-vence-premio-de-melhor-professor-do-mundo.ghtml"},"created":"2017-03-20T14:54:36.045Z","draft":false,"feedId":"42f93818-a7ce-41d9-9a3f-57f43df62f03","id":"0ee610c8-d893-4d57-9ea5-c033f406b5d4","isPinned":false,"lastPublication":"2017-03-20T14:54:35.826700902Z","modified":"2017-03-20T21:24:39.839Z","pinned":null,"postHash":"cd2bc14ae34b0925b182548e3e0d7ee1","publication":"2017-03-20T14:54:35.826700902Z","tenantId":"g1","type":"basico","versionId":"be05b39b-eb45-4cea-a0e0-7dd610494e98"}],"limit":30,"nextPage":4,"perPage":30,"referer":"/educacao/index.html"})}f=b.querySelector('.areatemplate-esquerda'),f&&(f.classList.remove(c+'-20',c+'-offset-2'),g=f.parentNode.classList,g.remove('small-'+d,c+'-un'+d),g.add(c+'-'+d,'large-un'+d));var                 </p></div></a></li></ul></div></div></section></section><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/videos/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="AULAS EM VÍDEO">
                    AULAS EM VÍDEO

                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/educacao/oab/noticia/2015/12/oab-divulga-o-resultado-definitivo-da-1-fase-do-xviii-exame-de-ordem.html" title="OAB divulga o resultado definitivo da 1ª fase do XVIII Exame de Ordem (Marcos Dantas/G1 AM)" class="card-lista-item-wide-link"><div class="card-lista-item-wide gui-image-hover"><figure data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"
